attributes.action: Southern Rail poor performance. Over crowded trains, staff continually striking.
attributes.background: I am commuter and I am affected by the Southern rail dispute with its staff. East Croydon Main Line Train stations was closed on day of the aslef strike. Trains are over crowded everyday and lack carriages. There are no refunds offered at purchase of a new ticket for failing to meet obligations!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
